headline: 2 U.S. Service Members Killed in Afghan Bomb Blast
abstract: The Taliban claimed responsibility for the attack, a roadside bomb that hit a U.S. forces vehicle.
lead_paragraph: KABUL, Afghanistan â€” Two American service members were killed and two others were wounded in a roadside bomb explosion in southern Afghanistan on Saturday, the United States military command in Afghanistan said in a statement. They were the first American military fatalities in Afghanistan this year.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
